text: Andrew Dominik (born 7 October 1967) is an Australian filmmaker. He is a screenwriter and director. He wrote and directed the feature movies Chopper (2000), The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford (2007), Killing Them Softly (2012) and Blonde (2022). Dominik was born in Wellington, New Zealand. He moved to Australia at the age of two. He grew up in Melbourne, Victoria. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Australian movie directors Category:Australian screenwriters Category:Australian television directors Category:Writers from Melbourne Category:Writers from Wellington
title: Andrew Dominik
